name: Podcast Details Extractor
shortDescription: Extract podcast information and contact details from Apple Podcasts or Google Podcasts URLs.
longDescription: The Podcast Details Extractor helps you quickly gather essential information about any podcast from its Apple Podcasts or Google Podcasts URL. Get the podcast owner's email, show description, category, and more - all the details you need to craft the perfect pitch.
useCases: Research podcasts before pitching as a guest
Gather show details for personalized outreach
Build a database of target podcasts
keyBenefits: Works with Apple and Google Podcasts

definition.title: What is a Podcast Details Extractor?
definition.content: A Podcast Details Extractor is a tool that retrieves metadata from podcast directories like Apple Podcasts and Google Podcasts. It pulls information from the podcast's RSS feed including the show title, description, owner name, email address, categories, and more - saving you hours of manual research.

tips: Use the owner email to send personalized pitch emails directly to decision makers
Check the last episode date to ensure the podcast is still active
Review the podcast category to tailor your pitch to their audience
Read the show description to understand their content focus

howItWorks.title: Paste Podcast URL
howItWorks.description: Enter an Apple Podcasts or Google Podcasts URL.

howItWorks.title: Extract Details
howItWorks.description: We fetch the podcast's RSS feed and extract key information.

howItWorks.title: Use the Data
howItWorks.description: Copy the owner email and details for your outreach.

features.title: Email Extraction
features.description: Find the podcast owner's email address from the RSS feed.

features.title: Show Details
features.description: Get title, description, category, and publication dates.

features.title: Cover Art
features.description: View the podcast's cover image and branding.

features.title: Multi-Platform
features.description: Works with both Apple Podcasts and Google Podcasts URLs.

faq.question: What podcast platforms are supported?
faq.answer: Currently we support Apple Podcasts and Google Podcasts URLs. Both platforms provide access to the podcast's RSS feed which contains the metadata.

faq.question: Will I always get an email address?
faq.answer: Not all podcasts include an owner email in their RSS feed. The availability depends on what information the podcast owner has provided.

faq.question: Is this tool free to use?
faq.answer: Yes, the Podcast Details Extractor is completely free to use. Registered users get unlimited extractions and can save podcasts to their dashboard.

faq.question: Can I use this for cold outreach?
faq.answer: Yes, this tool is designed to help you research podcasts for guest pitching. Always personalize your outreach based on the show details you extract.

testimonial.quote: This tool saved me hours of research. I found the owner email for 20 podcasts in minutes instead of digging through websites.
testimonial.author: Sarah M.

platformCta.heading: Manage your podcast guesting workflow
